# Loading data
## Acquire data to server

```{bash}
# load samples
wget https://www.ebi.ac.uk/arrayexpress/files/E-MTAB-8905/E-MTAB-8905.sdrf.txt
# Extract URLs and fetch data
cut -f 32 SAMPLE_FILE > URL_FILE
wget -i URL_FILE
# unzip data
gunzip -r DIRECTORY
```
